data.current_description: Create an OS policy assignment. This method also creates the first revision of the OS policy assignment. This method returns a long running operation (LRO) that contains the rollout details. The rollout can be cancelled by cancelling the LRO. For more information, see [Method: projects.locations.osPolicyAssignments.operations.cancel](https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/osconfig/rest/v1/projects.locations.osPolicyAssignments.operations/cancel).
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new OS policy assignment and initiates its first revision. This operation returns a long-running operation (LRO) containing rollout details that track the deployment of the OS policy to targeted VM instances. The rollout can be monitored or cancelled via the returned LRO. Requires an OSPolicyAssignment object specifying the policy rules, target instances, and deployment configuration. Side effects: Initiates policy deployment to all matching VM instances according to the assignment's rollout strategy.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description mentions LRO and cancellation but lacks clarity about what the operation returns immediately, what inputs are required, and the side effects of policy deployment. AI agents need to understand the asynchronous nature and that this triggers actual policy application to instances.
